蚇蚇蚇

蚇字的基本解释

蚇
chǐ
〔蚇蠖（
hu?）〕同“尺蠖”，尺蠖蛾的幼虫，虫体细长，行动时身体一屈一伸地前进，有的种类危害树木。

蚇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǐ］
［《集韻》昌石切，入昔，昌。］
亦作“蚇1”。
见“蚸蠖”。

蚇字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚇； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1077第15
【唐韻】【集韻】?昌石切，音尺。蚇蠖，蟲名。詳蠖字註。　《易》作尺。

蚇字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
蚇字的起名意思

暂无。

Clam
Basic explanation of words
Clam
chǐ
〔蚇蠖（
hu?)] Same as "Inchworm", the larvae of the inchworm moth have a long and slender body. When they move, their body flexes and stretches forward. Some species harm trees.
Clam
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chǐ]
["Ji Yun" Chang Shi cuts into the past, Chang. ]
Also known as "Clam 1".
See "Cartworm".
Clam
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚇; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1077 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Chang stone cut, sound ruler. Clam, insect name. Detailed note of the word.　"Easy" as a ruler.
Clam

сущ. гусеница-землемер, гусеница пяденицы
